## ConcurrentDecoderFacade class

Default concurrent decoder helper.

A convenient singleton that maintains a separate \[\[ConcurrentWorkerSet\]\] for each bundle requested. Provides easy access to \[\[WorkerBasedDecoder\]\]s for data sources.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ConcurrentDecoderFacade 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultScriptUrl](./harp-mapview.concurrentdecoderfacade.defaultscripturl.md) | <code>static</code> | string | The URL containing a script to fall back (default) to when looking for worker sets and decoders. |
|  [defaultWorkerCount](./harp-mapview.concurrentdecoderfacade.defaultworkercount.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The default number of workers. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [destroy()](./harp-mapview.concurrentdecoderfacade.destroy.md) | <code>static</code> | Destroys all managed \[\[ConcurrentWorkerSet\]\]s. |
|  [destroyWorkerSet(scriptUrl)](./harp-mapview.concurrentdecoderfacade.destroyworkerset.md) | <code>static</code> | Destroys a \[\[ConcurrentWorkerSet\]\] instance. |
|  [getTileDecoder(decoderServiceType, scriptUrl, workerCount)](./harp-mapview.concurrentdecoderfacade.gettiledecoder.md) | <code>static</code> | Returns a \[\[WorkerBasedDecoder\]\] instance. |
|  [getWorkerSet(scriptUrl, workerCount)](./harp-mapview.concurrentdecoderfacade.getworkerset.md) | <code>static</code> | Returns a \[\[ConcurrentWorkerSet\]\] instance based on the script URL specified. |
